name: gov-page-title
label: 标题
codeSnap: <gov-page-title title="标题标题标题标题标题" size="small"></gov-page-title>

demoCode.s:
<view class="preview-caption">带箭头、可点击</view>
    <view class="preview-section">
        <gov-page-title
            bind:click="clickFn"
            title="标题标题标题标题"
            size="middle"
            is-turn
        />
    </view>
    <view class="preview-caption">有底部border</view>
    <view class="preview-section">
        <gov-page-title title="标题标题标题标题标题" size="large" has-border/>
    </view>
    <view class="preview-caption-bottom">样式自定义</view>
    <view class="preview-section">
        <gov-page-title
            title="标题标题标题"
            size="large"
            desc="次要信息"
            turn-desc="辅助信息"
            gov-title-wrap="gov-title-wrap"
            gov-title="gov-title"
            gov-desc="gov-desc"
        />
    </view>

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: 标题大小，有效值为small、middle、large，分别对应48、54、66字号

externalClasses.name: gov-title-wrap
externalClasses.description: 标题的扩展样式类，可通过此class改变标题的样式

externalClasses.name: gov-title
externalClasses.description: 主标题的扩展样式类，可通过此class改变主标题的样式

externalClasses.name: gov-desc
externalClasses.description: 下方副标题的扩展样式类，可通过此class改变下方副标题的样式

externalClasses.name: gov-turn-title
externalClasses.description: 跳转描述信息的扩展样式类，可通过此class改变跳转描述信息的样式
